sources.title: Tizoc(1957)
sources.description: NOW IN ITS ORIGINAL WIDESCREEN FORMAT PLOT: A white woman enters into a romance with a Mexican Indian. The racial barriers between the lovers prove to be insurmountable, resulting in tragedy.

metadata.Plot: A white woman enters into a romance with a Mexican Indian. The racial barriers between the lovers prove to be insurmountable, resulting in tragedy.
metadata.Writer: Manuel R. Ojeda, Carlos Orellana, Ricardo Parada de León
metadata.Actors: María Félix, Pedro Infante, Andrés Soler
